summary: Basketball superstar Dennis Rodman stars as a hip Interpol agent attempting to defeat the deadly plans of a crazed arms dealer.
cast: Dennis Rodman|Dane Cook|John Pinette|Ricky Harris|Filip Nikolic|Natalia Cigliuti|Emma Wiklund|Jérôme Pradon|Xin Xin Xiong|Henry Courseaux|Igor De Savitch|Clayton Day|Jean-Michel Dagory|Pierre Madengar|Kevin Alyn Elders|Mitchell Waite|Auguste Gouiran|Fabrice Tressols|Fatty|Cyrille Dufaut|Jean-Elie Pucci|Jamal Belhadi|Frederic Garcia|Bernard Deloche|Sonny Stark|Versace Fortune|Marie Dame
director: Director: Kevin Alyn Elders (as Kevin Elders)
title: Rescate explosivo
